ELVG.summary: Elvictor Group, Inc., through its subsidiary, provides crew management services to the shipping industry worldwide. It engages in crew management, training, and creation of in-house software related to crew and ship matters. The company was formerly known as Thenablers, Inc. and changed its name to Elvictor Group, Inc. in December 2019. Elvictor Group, Inc. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Limassol, Cyprus.
